message.body: Would staying at your place Sat night be an option too? I cant find anything on airbnb :(. They are all $200+ and then parking is like $50. Yikes
yeah it’s really expensive! I am supposed to head out for Vermont Saturday m owning with Hunter’s car. I can leave the key hidden for you guys though. no one will be at the house
hunter is going on a camping/bike trip and nate will be in upstate NY
Would it be safe to hide a key?
Or if you have a spare key you can give it to me Friday and I'll leave it on the table when I leave on Saturday
I meant when i leave sunday
That could work. It's about 3, 3.5 hour drive to NYC from here. Maybe you guys could take the train in. Faster.
